description: Whether you pound the pavement in urban jungles or on deserted country roads, rest assured you’ll feel comfortable and dry in the lightweight men’s ESSENTIAL SEAMLESS long-sleeve running t-shirt by ODLO. Its regular fit and soft, elastic fabric offer enhanced moisture management and airflow to help keep you comfortable in the heat. Featuring sustainable, 100% organic-based ZeroScent technology, the material is protected from odour-causing bacteria to keep you fresh, whilst the seamless construction enhances comfort and reduces chafing. An eye-catching gradient graphic and reflective details add a dash of style and visibility. Stay one step ahead of the rest when you run this summer in the men’s ESSENTIAL SEAMLESS long-sleeve running top by ODLO.
name: Odlo Essentials L/S Running Shirt -  Mens
